questions.question: In the solar cell experiment, what is the purpose of using a load resistor?

answers.a: To control the intensity of the incident light.
answers.b: To provide a path for the flow of electrical current.
answers.c: To convert electrical energy into light energy.
answers.d: To regulate the temperature of the solar cell.

questions.question: In the solar cell experiment, keeping other variables constant how the intensity of the incident light varies the electrical output of the solar cell?

answers.a: The electrical output decreases with increase in the intensity of incident light.
answers.b: The electrical output remain the same with increase in the intensity of incident light.
answers.c: The electrical output becomes zero with increase in the intensity of incident light.
answers.d: The electrical output increases with increase in the intensity of incident light.

questions.question: What is the difference between solar cell and photodiode?

answers.a: No external bias in solar cell and it is used in converting light energy into electrical energy
answers.b: No external bias in photodiode and photodiodes detect light levels and produce electrical signals
answers.c: Larger surface area in photodiode and it is used in converting light energy into electrical energy
answers.d: There is no difference between solar cell and photodiode

questions.question: Which of the following factors can significantly affect the efficiency of a solar cell?

answers.a: The type of load resistor used in the experiment.
answers.b: The color of the laboratory walls.
answers.c: The material used for the anti-reflective coating.
answers.d: The wavelength of the incident light.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the anti-reflective coating used on the surface of some solar cells?

answers.a: To increase the color perception of the solar cell.
answers.b: To protect the solar cell from mechanical damage.
answers.c: To improve the structural stability of the solar cell.
answers.d: To reduce the reflection of incident light and increase light absorption.
